member.name: M:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.HiLoVersionGenerator.GenerateNextHi
member.summary: Only one thread may execute this at a given time. Note that this forces a NEW session and transaction, and doesn't use the existing one.

member.name: M:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.HiLoVersionGenerator.GenerateNextVersion
member.summary: The formula is: (Hi-1)*Capacity+(++Lo) Full details about it can be found here: http://devlicio.us/blogs/tuna_toksoz/archive/2009/05/18/id-generation-for-db4o.aspx

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.AddItemRequest.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key of the list to add the data to.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.AddItemRequest.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the data to add to the list

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.GetItemsRequest.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to use for the list to get.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to store this value at.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.ReplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the replication version for this value.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.ParentVersions
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent versions for this value

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.ExpiresAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the time this value expires at.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.ReplicationTimeStamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the replication time stamp.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.Bytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the data for this key value.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.OptimisticConcurrency
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether we should use optimistic concurrency when setting this value.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value whether this value should be treated as read only. Read only values means that the value is read only, not that it is treated as read only by the PHT. This means that no concurrency checks are made, and that it is safe to cache it in many places, as long as the expiration time isn't passed.
member.value: true if this value should be treated as read only; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutRequest.Tag
member.summary: Tag is a user specified value that allow the user to perform efficent searchs on top of the Key/Value interface that we expose

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.GetRequest.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to get the value from the PHT.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.GetRequest.SpecifiedVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the specified version for this value.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutResult.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the newly created value.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.PutResult.ConflictExists
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a conflict was created when setting this value.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.RemoveItemRequest.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key of the list to remove.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.RemoveItemRequest.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the id for the item to remove.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.RemoveRequest.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key.

member.name: P:Rhino.PersistentHashTable.ValueVersion.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance id for this version

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of this version.
